lead_paragraph: The Toronto Maple Leafs signed the veteran center Michael Peca to a one-year, $2.5 million contract. Pecca, 32, spent last season with the Edmonton Oilers. He had 9 goals and 14 assists in 71 regular-season games. An 11-year veteran, Peca is a two-time winner of the Selke Trophy, which goes to the N.H.L.’s top defensive forward.
